channel.title: Projects on Do Won Kim
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on Do Won Kim

item.title: Minimalist Hugo Template for Academic Websites
item.description: This template produces a personal website with Hugo. The website has a minimalist projects and is customized for academics, scientists, and researchers.

item.title: Minimalist LaTeX Template for Academic Presentations
item.description: This template produces a presentation with LaTeX and Beamer. The slides have a minimalist projects and are customized for academics and other researchers.
